task.title: Customizing business cards in Docker
task.shortdesc: You can override the default business cards configuration by editing a UserInfoConfig.xml file and adding it as a volume in the docker-compose.yml.

step.cmd: Copy the existing file out of the community container and place it in the current Sametime installation directory.
step.info: To identify the community container ID, run the command docker container ls and look for the chat-server IMAGE. The NAME is the container name, as an example: sametime-community-1.
